downloadTitle: MapPoint Streets and Trips 2005 Construction Update
downloadDescription: Download the latest construction data to keep your maps current.
detailsSection: Download the latest road construction data to keep your Streets and Trips 2005 maps current.
installInstructionSection:
1. Close Streets & Trips.

  2. Click the Download link to start the download.

  3. Click Save or Save this program to disk.

  4. Save the file in the Data folder, located where you installed the program files for Streets & Trips. For example, C:\Program Files\Microsoft Streets & Trips\Data\.

  5. Restart Streets & Trips.
